content: off do not join to the first stitch and leave a long tail tongue *using red* chain 2 in second chain from hook make 1 single_crochet bind off leaving a small tail and do your best to weave the ends into that tiny piece use the starting tail from the mouth to sew the tongue inside the mouth piece use the bind off tail to sew the mouth piece under the face of the dog between row 7 & 8 see pictures below for better detail page 5 of 9 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com ears make 2 row instructions stitches ears are done all in brown 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook 6 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the slip_stitch from the previous round 7 3 6 work even 7 7 1 decrease 3 single_crochet 1 decrease 5 bind off leaving a long tail so you can sew the ears to the head later on the ears will go even with the eyes in the brown section of the head front legs make 2 row instructions stitches 1 *start using black* 8 chain 2 8 single_crochet in second chain from hook 2 *cut black and finish the ret of the leg with white* 8 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet in the round 3 *2 single_crochet 1 decrease* around 6 if using a marble in the foot for weight put it in now before you join the round 4 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 6 5 single_crochet in first 5 single_crochet increase in last single_crochet 7 6 work even 7 bind off leaving a long tail so you can sew the legs to the body later on to weight the dog so she doesn t tip onto her nose when she s standing up later on cram a marble or some other weight into the foot section i used small glass marbles i found in the floral section of my local craft store for this project but i ve also used marbles i found on my kids bedroom floors for other projects stuff the little bit of leg that is left with polyfil page 6 of 9 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com back right leg row instruction stitches 1 *start using black* 9 chain 2 9 single_crochet in second chain from hook 2 *cut black and begin using white* 9 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet in the round 3 *1 single_crochet 1 decrease* around 6 if using the marble for weight put it in before joining this round 4 work even 6 5 *cut white and begin using brown* 8 *2 single_crochet 1 increase* around 6 work even 8 bind off leaving a long tail so you can sew the leg to the body later on this leg goes on the right side of the dog and should line up with brown stitches on the body back left leg row
